name: LOBBY
locationInformation: ChaiOne is an Enterprise Mobility Agency focused on creating innovative, beautiful mobile solutions that solve complex business problems of large enterprises, with a specific focus on the energy industry.

name: PRODUCT
locationInformation: This is the product room where we work on innovative apps showcasing the best of our developers to the public. This app, powered by ContextHub was developed in this room.

name: DELI
locationInformation: This is the Deli Room, where Deli Radio is developed. Deli Radio is a music discovery app designed for the connoisseur, generating a stream station based on local artists playing in a given location. Grab it from the App Store and Google Play today!

name: LOBBY
locationInformation: Exxon is one of our biggest clients. Our design and dev team spend their time happily working on this project. By 2015 the Exxon team will have produced 200 iOS and Android apps. Make sure to download them all!
